explains: n. 征服，占领；占领地，征服的土地；克服，攻克；爱情的俘虏
wordGroup: norman conquest [史]诺曼底人对英格兰的军事征服

sentences.en: The chase is always much more exciting than the conquest anyway.
sentences.cn: 无论如何，追求总比征服更令人兴奋。

sentences.en: The play is being widely read as an allegory of imperialist conquest.
sentences.cn: 这出戏正被广泛地诠释为帝国主义征服的寓言。

sentences.en: The invasion is known as the Norman Conquest, and it is very important for two reasons.
sentences.cn: 这次入侵被称为诺曼征服，它之所以重要有两个原因。
